content.summary: Ayush Harsh is a graduate from the Indian Institute of Management Rohtak with an MBA degree and a B.Sc in Transportation Tech from the National Rail and Transportation Institute, Vadodara. He has demonstrated strong skills in digital marketing, sales, research, and leadership through various internships and academic projects.

experience.title: Sales and Marketing Intern
responsibilities: Analyzed 15+ competitors and led the implementation of pricing strategies to boost product launch u0026 increase market absorption.
Spearheaded market research in 2 regions, calculating PSF based on 3 criteria, resulting in an increase in lead conversion for GTM.
Compiled u0026 leveraged critical data on 30+ projects from over 15 leading developers, enhancing the sales team effectiveness.

experience.title: Content Writer Intern
responsibilities: Responded to audience comments and inquiries with an average monthly footfall of 250-280 to improve page views by 15%.
Published 5 SEO optimized articles daily to organically increase unique visitors by 27% and achieve higher ranking in SERP.
Increased click-through-rates u0026 blog homepage visits by 19% u0026 12% respectively through creating u0026 sharing viral sports content.

experience.title: Digital Marketing Intern
responsibilities: Conducted market research and competitor benchmarking leading to 37% increase in user conversion by identifying gaps.
Implemented content calendars u0026 schedules, ensuring timely delivery u0026 publication of content to increase user engagement by 16%.
Collaborated with graphics designers and media professionals to implement infographics leading to 19% decrease in bounce rate.
Increased CTR and page views by 23% and 29% by analyzing market trends, drafted user personas to develop travel packages.

experience.title: Nagpur Metro Operations Intern
responsibilities: Analyzed 4 processes u0026 learned the function of Operations Control Centre to achieve maximum efficiency in operating the metro.
Spearheaded meeting and brainstorming sessions to enhance customer satisfaction through installing bookshops and eateries.
Delivered detailed project report to OCC, Finance, and Rolling Stock department head while supervising a team of 4.

experience.title: Industrial Live Project Digital Marketing Intern
responsibilities: Identified gaps and increased lead generation by 18%, increasing visibility of the brand.
Aided in organizing a panel discussion involving 35+ CXOs from leading tech companies.
Enhanced website navigation through UX changes, leading to 20% decrease in bounce rate.

projects.title: National Rail and Transportation Institute Survey
projects.objectives: To understand the management of household waste by 100+ participants.
projects.contributions: Discovered 89.1% of the participants were ready to segregate waste for an average of Rs 10/Kg and projected revenue of Rs 54,000/household/year u0026 reduce waste management by 3.4%.

certifications: Python, Data Sciences, Microeconomics certifications on Coursera

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: 88.00% in Class XII,93.10% in Class X
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Organized TedX talks, Blood Donation Campaign, volunteered during COVID.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Led teams in sports events, football team, and industrial projects.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Responded to audience comments, published articles daily.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Secured 1st Position in Model United Nations Debate, College E-Sports Call of Duty Tournament.
